Personalise.Name: Rob Fraser
Personalise.Slogan: I lead the UK Technical Evangelism team
Personalise.ThirdPersonBio: Rob joined Microsoft in 2011 as Cloud CTO and now considers himself to have the best job in the world leading UK Technical Evangelism. Prior to Microsoft, Rob was a founder and CTO of RiskMetrics Group, a highly successful Financial Services Software-as-a-Service technology firm and was part of the Microsoft Customer Advisory Board on Cloud Computing. Originally an Aerospace Engineering apprentice at BAE Systems, Rob has a PhD in Artificial Intelligence.
Personalise.FirstPersonBio: I joined Microsoft in 2011 as Cloud CTO and now considers myself to have the best job in the world leading UK Technical Evangelism. Originally an Aerospace Engineering apprentice at BAE Systems, I have a PhD in Artificial Intelligence.
Personalise.ShortBio: Rob works for Microsoft and leads the UK Technical Evangelism team
Personalise.Technologies: Technology Futures, Technology Strategy, SaaS, Cloud (general), Azure, Artificial Intelligence, Futurism
